title: One Dies: Colin Moriarty or Portillo the Wiener Dog - Gregway
description:
There can be only one! Which will it be...

Big thanks to Peter Petersen for the question.

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE/BUY T-SHIRTS: http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

Leave your questions for Greg as a video response and check back every Wednesday and Friday to see what he's saying.

Subscribe to our channel: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

Check out our Merch Store: http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

The Vlog playlist: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOlEpGVXWUVv1g9oZi6O95CwRHQd0ulT6

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

transcript_chunks.text: Hey , bonjour, it's a Gregway. You know, the show every Wednesday and Friday I answer one of your questions, comments, or tweets and say just what's happening in the Greg spin of things, right? Today's question comes from Peter Peterson. Was that his real name? You be the judge. Peter Peterson says, Greg, if you had to choose, would you give away Colin or Portillo? It's a tough choice to ask me to make, Peter Peterson. Like, see, I have, I have follow-up, I have questions on all of this, right? So what does that mean, give away Colin or Portillo in quotes? Like, are they being sentenced to death or are they just like going about their lives? I just can't ever talk to them again. Like, what, what, what, what's the trade? So, like, if I give away Portillo, is someone there to take care of him or am I leaving him in the woods? If I give away Colin, does he have all his stuff and his job and his livelihood and everything else, right? Like, is if it's death, then clearly I'm picking Colin. He's a human being. I love Pell . give away Colin, does he have all his stuff and his job and his livelihood and everything else, right? Like, is if it's death, then clearly I'm picking Colin. He's a human being. I love Pell. We, we've talked about on the shows before here on GameOverGreggy.com in a zombie apocalypse, one of the first thing that happened, Pello has to die. Pello barks at every knock, every noise. He can't exist in that, you know what I mean? Like, I've already wrestled with the, you know, zombie apocalypse and now this up Sophie's Choice on how this would work. I there, there's different factors you weigh. So if it's death, I'm giving away Portillo. I'm letting Colin live so he can continue to be crotchety and watch hockey.
